if I wish to format and mount a hd as reserfs, do i need to give it swap memory even knowing it will only be used for storage?
Swap is for extending the memory, you don't need it for storage.
ok so i can just use the hd as reserfs and not assign any swap memory to it? i dont plan on running files from it only pure backup/storage
Yes, you don't need swap on every harddisk.
